org.jpws.pwslib.data

Interface PwsRawFieldReader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.Iterator<PwsRawField>

    public interface PwsRawFieldReader
extends java.util.Iterator<PwsRawField>
    Interface extending an iterator over PwsRawField objects decrypted from the persistent state of a PWS file.

    The Iterator interface is extended by a close operation and a blocksize. This reader returns the results from analysing a data stream from a persistent state of a PWS file and renders elements of type PwsRawField in the order as they are encountered in the source.

    Closing the reader is possible to inform the object that no more input is needed. The reader will then behave as if the end of the stream were reached. (Closing is automatically performed when the last data element of the file was read from the reader.) The close operation does, however, not close an underlying input stream.

    See Also:
    PwsFileInputSocket
